item.title: The Yellow House
item.description: Traditional Finnish House found on the island of Suomenlinna, Helsinki, Taken on Nikon D5100

item.description: Photo of Edinburgh Castle behind Ross Fountain in Princes Street Gardens, Scotland. Shot on Pixel 7a

item.title: The Batavia
item.description: The Batavia, A reconstruction of a ship from 1628, found in Lelystad in the Netherlands. Taken on OnePlus 7T Pro.

item.title: Château d’eau du Peyrou
item.description: Château d’eau du Peyrou, a traditional structure sitting upon water in Monpellier, France.

item.title: Église Saint-Roch de Montpellier
item.description: Side alley leading upto Église Saint-Roch de Montpellier, which is adorned in gorgeous sculptures. Taken using a Nikon D5100

item.title: Grand Hotel du Midi
item.description: Picturesque hotel nestled the cramped central streets of Montpellier, France. Taken using a Nikon D5100

item.title: La Grande-Motte
item.description: Sun setting behind boats in the Port of La Grande-Motte, France. Taken using a Nikon D5100
